channel.title: Papermod on Said CANKIRAN
channel.description: Recent content in Papermod on Said CANKIRAN

item.title: Zero to Hugo
item.description: Introduction In this article, I’ll write about how to create your personal website or landing page or any website which you want to show to internet with Hugo and Github Pages. And ofcourse with nocode. No matter what field you work in, with a little bit of Git and Terminal knowladge, you can easily set up and deploy the site you want. If you’re ready, let’s start. First of all, what is Hugo?
